p: The association of anti- Alphavirus IgG with RVFV and Flavivirus IgG, viruses sharing Aedes spp. as vector, is however retained in multivariable analysis. This shows that in addition to age, elevation and slope, additional relevant factors still influence the spread of these Aedes â€“ borne infections which remain to be identified. Others have found higher seroprevalences in Cameroonians living under corrugated iron roofs vs. thatched grass roofs; furthermore, living in rural areas was associated with higher seroprevalences [33].
